rules.text: We do not allow adult or violent content.
We do not allow racism, sexism, homophobia, transphobia, xenophobia, meritocracy, casteism, etc.
Advertising accounts are prohibited. You can advertise yourself to some extent, but that shouldn't be the sole purpose of your account.
We do not allow conspiracy to commit terrorism or participation in crime.
Prohibition of acts that offend other users or promote social conflict.
Prohibition of abnormal behavior, etc. causing system failure.

Bots cannot create public posts without the permission of @admin and cannot follow other people's accounts without the consent of the account owner. In addition, bots should not send messages to other accounts first.
Must never impersonate anyone other than an agreed prank.
Sign up through temporary mail, or guerrilla mail is prohibited. Please sign up with your email.
Only accounts related to animation, cartoon, game are accepted for registration are accepted.
Please follow the rules of the server and check the terms and conditions of the server before signing up.
